summary_md: Bulgaria, in the year 2024, has a GDP per capita of 10,090 USD per person (NY.GDP.PCAP.KD), with an inflation rate of 2.45% (FP.CPI.TOTL.ZG), and an unemployment rate of 4.10% (SL.UEM.TOTL.ZS). The average life expectancy is 75.71 years years (SP.DYN.LE00.IN), and internet usage stands at 80.40% (IT.NET.USER.ZS). The country's export growth is at 55.81% (NE.EXP.GNFS.ZS).

sections.economy_md: Bulgaria's economy is characterized by a GDP per capita of 10,090 USD per person (NY.GDP.PCAP.KD) and an export growth of 55.81% (NE.EXP.GNFS.ZS).
sections.labor_md: The labor market shows an unemployment rate of 4.10% (SL.UEM.TOTL.ZS), indicating the general employment situation.
sections.digital_md: With an internet usage rate of 80.40% (IT.NET.USER.ZS), Bulgaria is integrating into the digital economy.
sections.health_env_md: The average life expectancy in Bulgaria is 75.71 years years (SP.DYN.LE00.IN), reflecting the country's health environment.
